description: - https://www.patreon.com/herejeselpodcast ¿Piensas que el mito de origen del cristianismo, con una paloma que embaraza, y un muerto que resucita, no es suficientemente loco? ¡Tenemos la religión para ti! Está semana, los Herejes invitamos a nuestra amiga y gran comediante Lorx, a un viaje por la mente de L Ron Hubbard y sus seguidores marinos. Auditemonos todos juntos, en este experiencia espacial. - Ale Durán - https://twitter.com/FunkBob - - https://www.instagram.com/corsario.hereje/- Ale Vázquez -  https://instagram.com/vasco.hereje/ -- Bobby López - https://twitter.com/BobbyEsqvlz - - https://www.instagram.com/bobbyesqvlz/ -   - Lorx- https://www.instagram.com/lorxj/- https://www.instagram.com/malas_amistades_/?igshid=hko0ldl5m58k- https://www.instagram.com/virgincomedy_corp/?igshid=aowamtswvm14“Who Was L. Ron Hubbard”https://www.scientologynews.org/faq/who-was-l-ron-hubbard.html“Quien es Xenu”https://www.xenu.net/archive/leaflet/xenusp.htm“Long before Xenu: Scientology’s actual origin story, as told by a former member”https://tonyortega.org/2015/07/24/long-before-xenu-scientologys-actual-origin-story-as-told-by-a-former-member/“La Verdadera Historia de Scientology, por L. Ron Hubbard”https://www.freedommag.org/es/magazine/201803-scientology-network/the-true-story-of-scientology.html“L.A Times Scientology Story”https://www.latimes.com/local/la-scientology-sg-storygallery.html“10 Tragic Facts About Sara Northrup, L. Ron Hubbard’s Wife”https://listverse.com/2018/07/23/10-tragic-facts-about-sara-northrup-l-ron-hubbards-wife/“Scientology Founder's Family Life Far From What He Preached”www.sfgate.com/news/article/Scientology-Founder-s-Family-Life-Far-From-What-2952900.php“Xenu´s Paradox. The Fiction of L.Ron Hubbard and the Making of Scientology”https://longreads.com/2017/02/01/xenus-paradox-the-fiction-of-l-ron-hubbard/“Heber Jentzsch”https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heber_Jentzsch“The Apostate”https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2011/02/14/the-apostate-lawrence-wright“Eyes Wide Shut”https://www.nytimes.com/2013/01/20/books/review/going-clear-lawrence-wrights-book-on-scientology.html“Going Clear” Libro, Lawrence Wrighthttps://www.amazon.com/-/es/Lawrence-Wright-ebook/dp/B00A9ET54E“Going Clear” Documental, Alexander Gibneyhttps://www.imdb.com/title/tt4257858/referenceDianética - https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dian%C3%A9ticaDianetics - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DianeticsWhere is the missing wife of Scientology's ruthless leader? 60 Minutes Australia - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P7QWifeY2_AJoe Rogan Experience 947: Ron Miscavige - https://open.spotify.com/episode/7yudKvJmKvyvOrHTbMXmTj?si=Znk--Nd2Qp2DFvCAFPmNJQ   ---   Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/herejes-podcast/support Learn more about your ad choices. html_description:
- https://www.patreon.com/herejeselpodcast

¿Piensas que el mito de origen del cristianismo, con una paloma que embaraza, y un muerto que resucita, no es suficientemente loco? ¡Tenemos la religión para ti! Está semana, los Herejes invitamos a nuestra amiga y gran comediante Lorx, a un viaje por la mente de L Ron Hubbard y sus seguidores marinos. Auditemonos todos juntos, en este experiencia espacial.

- Ale Durán
- https://twitter.com/FunkBob -
- https://www.instagram.com/corsario.hereje/

- Ale Vázquez
-  https://instagram.com/vasco.hereje/ -

- Bobby López
- https://twitter.com/BobbyEsqvlz -
- https://www.instagram.com/bobbyesqvlz/ -   

- Lorx
- https://www.instagram.com/lorxj/
- https://www.instagram.com/malas_amistades_/?igshid=hko0ldl5m58k
- https://www.instagram.com/virgincomedy_corp/?igshid=aowamtswvm14

“Who Was L. Ron Hubbard”
https://www.scientologynews.org/faq/who-was-l-ron-hubbard.html
“Quien es Xenu”
https://www.xenu.net/archive/leaflet/xenusp.htm
“Long before Xenu: Scientology’s actual origin story, as told by a former member”
https://tonyortega.org/2015/07/24/long-before-xenu-scientologys-actual-origin-story-as-told-by-a-former-member/
“La Verdadera Historia de Scientology, por L. Ron Hubbard”
https://www.freedommag.org/es/magazine/201803-scientology-network/the-true-story-of-scientology.html
“L.A Times Scientology Story”
https://www.latimes.com/local/la-scientology-sg-storygallery.html
“10 Tragic Facts About Sara Northrup, L. Ron Hubbard’s Wife”
https://listverse.com/2018/07/23/10-tragic-facts-about-sara-northrup-l-ron-hubbards-wife/
“Scientology Founder's Family Life Far From What He Preached”
www.sfgate.com/news/article/Scientology-Founder-s-Family-Life-Far-From-What-2952900.php
“Xenu´s Paradox. The Fiction of L.Ron Hubbard and the Making of Scientology”
https://longreads.com/2017/02/01/xenus-paradox-the-fiction-of-l-ron-hubbard/
“Heber Jentzsch”
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heber_Jentzsch
“The Apostate”
https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2011/02/14/the-apostate-lawrence-wright
“Eyes Wide Shut”
https://www.nytimes.com/2013/01/20/books/review/going-clear-lawrence-wrights-book-on-scientology.html
“Going Clear” Libro, Lawrence Wright
https://www.amazon.com/-/es/Lawrence-Wright-ebook/dp/B00A9ET54E
“Going Clear” Documental, Alexander Gibney
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4257858/reference
Dianética - https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dian%C3%A9tica
Dianetics - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dianetics
Where is the missing wife of Scientology's ruthless leader? 60 Minutes Australia - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P7QWifeY2_A
Joe Rogan Experience 947: Ron Miscavige - https://open.spotify.com/episode/7yudKvJmKvyvOrHTbMXmTj?si=Znk--Nd2Qp2DFvCAFPmNJQ

name: E057: Cienciología, delirio libre de impuestos (con Lorx)

show.description: Bienvenidos a "Herejes: El Podcast". Un espacio para conocer y discutir tópicos históricos, científicos, filosóficos, de actualidad y cultura popular, desde el pensamiento crítico y con la evidencia disponible. Intentamos siempre encontrar el Humor, y el punto medio del debate.
show.html_description: Bienvenidos a "Herejes: El Podcast". Un espacio para conocer y discutir tópicos históricos, científicos, filosóficos, de actualidad y cultura popular, desde el pensamiento crítico y con la evidencia disponible. Intentamos siempre encontrar el Humor, y el punto medio del debate.
